extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Mothachadh air prìobhaideachd, Adblock tèarainte airson YouTube ™. A’ cur casg air sanasan air YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Shàbhail Adblock airson Youtube™ timcheall air. $savedTime$ de do bheatha.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

videoBranding.message: Air a ghlanadh le Adblock airson YouTube™

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Seall na h-iarrtasan dùinte a’ cunntadh sa bhràiste
